title: just switched to 4k and need some help
body: so im using the display port and evreything, i tried putting league in the 4k resoultion and the proportining of evreything was super odd like the mini map was normal sized but all of the icons like players and towers were super tiny in comparison, so ive been runnign league in 1920 x 10 24 ( or whatever it is). and what will happen is randomly the screen will freeze go black and come back alike 5 seconds later, i can still talk via chat normally (vioce chat like discord) but the game sound and evreything kinda glitches for that time and then its fine for a while and does it agian, any help appreciated

replies.body: 4K or resolutions exceeding 1080 is not currently supported and can run into issues like this.  Your best bet would be to reduce your resolution to 1920x1080 or swapping to another monitor for the fix.  I know it's not the most ideal step, but I hope that helps!
What is the native resolution of your monitor and what gpu (graphics card) are you using
